trans-unit.source: Represents the collection of XML schemas.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class.
Adds an object to the end of the collection.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to be added to the collection of objects.
The index at which the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> is added.
Adds an instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class to the end of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> object to be added to the end of the collection.
Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>컬렉션에 대 한 어셈블리 참조를 나타내는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to add.
The <xref:System.Uri> of the schema object.
The index at which the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> is added.
Adds an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents an assembly reference to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 추가 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>컬렉션에 대 한 어셈블리 참조를 나타내는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to add.
Processes the element and attribute names in the XML schemas and, optionally, validates the XML schemas.
trans-unit.target: XML 스키마에서 요소 및 특성 이름을 처리 하 고 필요에 따라 XML 스키마의 유효성을 검사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following list identifies situations in which the Compile method is called: - By the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector> class while creating <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> objects from classes that are identified as Web services.
trans-unit.target: 다음 목록은 컴파일 메서드가 호출 되는 경우:-으로 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>클래스를 만드는 동안 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>웹 서비스로 식별 되는 클래스의 개체를.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector>

trans-unit.source: - By the Wsdl.exe tool or the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
trans-unit.target: -Wsdl.exe 도구로 또는 <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>클래스 설명 언어 WSDL (웹 서비스) 문서에서 클라이언트 프록시 클래스 또는 추상 서버 클래스를 생성 하는 동안.</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter>

trans-unit.source: - By the Xsd.exe tool while generating XML schemas from types found in assemblies.
trans-unit.target: -Xsd.exe 도구에 의해 어셈블리에 있는 형식에서 XML 스키마를 생성 하는 중입니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead of calling the Compile method directly, use the previously mentioned classes or tools.
trans-unit.target: 컴파일 메서드를 직접 호출 하는 대신 앞에서 언급 한 클래스 또는 도구를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> that specifies the callback method that handles errors and warnings during XML Schema validation, if the strict parameter is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> 엄격한 매개 변수가 설정 된 경우 XML 스키마 유효성 검사 중 오류 및 경고를 처리 하는 콜백 메서드를 지정 하 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to validate the XML schemas in the collection using the Compile method of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>컴파일 메서드를 사용 하 여 컬렉션에 있는 XML 스키마 유효성을 검사 하는 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 클래스입니다; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection contains an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that belongs to the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 포함 되어 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 된 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>지정된 된 네임 스페이스에 속하는 개체는.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the item to check for.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>항목이 발견 됩니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> contains a specific schema.
trans-unit.target: 결정 여부는 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 특정 스키마를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to locate.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the collection contains the specified item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>를 컬렉션에 지정된 된 항목입니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, which starts at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 전체 복사 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 호환 되는&1; 차원 <xref:System.Array>, 대상 배열의 지정한 인덱스에서 시작 되는.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the schemas copied from <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the array where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: 복사를 시작할 배열의 인덱스를 나타내는 32 비트 정수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Locates in one of the XML schemas an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> of the specified name and type.
trans-unit.target: XML 스키마 중 하나를 찾습니다는 <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"> </xref> 지정한 이름 및 형식이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName> that specifies a fully qualified name with a namespace used to locate an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>를 찾는 데 사용 되는 네임 스페이스와 정규화 된 이름을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>컬렉션의 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> </xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object to find.

Possible types include: <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttributeGroup"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref>, <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNotation"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> instance, such as an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaObject"></xref> instance, such as an <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of schemas that belong to the same namespace.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 네임 스페이스에 속해 있는 스키마의 컬렉션을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
The namespace of the schemas to retrieve.
An <xref:System.Collections.IList> implementation that contains the schemas.
Searches for the specified schema and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 스키마를 검색 하 고 전체에서 처음 나타나는&0;부터 시작 하는 인덱스를 반환 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to locate.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value within the entire <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 전체 값의 첫 번째 요소의&0;부터 시작 인덱스 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref>이거나, 없는 경우, 그렇지 않으면-1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a schema into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which `schema` should be inserted.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object to be inserted.
Gets a value that indicates whether the schemas have been compiled.
trans-unit.target: 스키마 컴파일 되었는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: You can compile the schemas referenced in a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas> object by invoking the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 참조 하는 스키마를 컴파일할 수는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas>를 호출 하 여 개체는 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the schemas have been compiled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>를 경우 스키마가 컴파일 되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Static method that determines whether the specified XML schema contains a custom <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""></xref> attribute set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, or its equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 XML 스키마에는 사용자 지정이 포함 되어 있는지 여부를 결정 하는 정적 메서드 <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""> </xref> 특성이로 설정 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, 또는 동등한 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The `IsDataSet` attribute comes from the namespace `urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata`.
The IsDataSet method is called by the .NET Framework's XML serialization infrastructure and does not need to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: IsDataSet 메서드는.NET Framework의 XML serialization 인프라에서 호출 되 고 직접 호출할 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XML schema to check for an <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""></xref> attribute with a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 확인 하려면 XML 스키마는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsDataSet" name="IsDataSet" href=""> </xref> 특성이 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified schema exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>지정된 된 스키마가 있으면; 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object at the specified index.
The index of the item to retrieve.
The specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
Gets a specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that represents the XML schema associated with the specified namespace.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 가져옵니다 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>지정된 된 네임 스페이스와 연결 된 XML 스키마를 나타내는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the specified object.
The specified <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object.
Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 내용을 지울 때 사용자 지정 프로세스를 추가로 수행 된 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before inserting a new element into the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 요소를 삽입 하기 전에 사용자 지정 프로세스를 추가로 수행 된 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
The new value of the element at `index`.
Performs additional custom processes when removing an element from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 요소를 제거 하는 경우 사용자 지정 프로세스를 추가로 수행 된 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
The value of the element to remove at `index`.
Performs additional custom processes before setting a value in the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하기 전에 사용자 지정 프로세스를 추가로 수행는 <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `oldValue` can be found.
The value to replace with `newValue`.
The new value of the element at `index`.
Removes the first occurrence of a specific schema from the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> to remove.
To be added.
